summary: During the air war over Vietnam, a U.S. Navy A-6 Intruder bomber pilot schemes with a hardened veteran to make an unauthorized air strike on Hanoi.
cast: Danny Glover|Willem Dafoe|Brad Johnson|Rosanna Arquette|Tom Sizemore|J. Kenneth Campbell|Jared Chandler|Dann Florek|Madison Mason|Ving Rhames|Christopher Rich|Douglas Roberts|Scott N. Stevens|Justin Williams|John Corbett|Adam Nelson|Adam Biesk|Reb Brown|Peter Sherayko|J. Patrick McNamara|David Glyn Price|James O'Neel|Hugo Napier|David Schwimmer|Richard Fancy|Rick Dano|Mike Jolly|Tom Kriss|Jeff O'Haco|Grove E. Johnson|Jonnie C. Pangyarihan Sr.|Duane Matthews|Eddie Badiang|Minh Huu Do|Brian Khaw|Akio Mitamura|Alison Furrevig|Connie B. Canales|Ernie Seliceo|Ken Wright|Bob Bergen|Oliver Theess|Fred Thompson|David Wilson
title: El vuelo del Intruder
